          <title>
            <string language="en">Movement of particles in a cooling gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der Partikel in einem abkühlenden Gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement des particules dans un gaz de 
refroidissement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento das partículas em um gás 
refrigerando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento delle particelle in un gas di 
raffreddamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση των μορίων σε μια ψύξη αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de partículas en un gas que se 
refresca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows how particles in gas move when they are cooled below boiling point.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attractive forces</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">movement of particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Partikel im Gas 
bewegen, wenn sie unterhalb des Siedepunkts abgekühlt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre comment les particules en gaz
se déplacent quand elles sont refroidies au-dessous du point 
d'ébullition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra como as partículas no gás se
movem quando são refrigeradas abaixo do ponto fervendo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra come le particelle in gas si
muovono quando sono raffreddate sotto il punto di ebollizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός επιδεικνύει πώς τα μόρια κινούνται 
αέριο όταν δροσίζονται κάτω από το σημείο βρασμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra cómo las partículas en gas 
se mueven cuando se refrescan debajo de punta que hierve.</string>
          </description>
